mapper.select: SELECT PD_CT1_NO AS pdCt1No , (SELECT NAME FROM tb_pd_ct_depth1 WHERE PD_CT1_NO = TB_PD_CT_DEPTH2.PD_CT1_NO) AS pdCt1Name , COUNT(PD_CT1_NO) AS pdCt1Count FROM TB_PD_CT_DEPTH2 WHERE USE_YN = 'Y' GROUP BY PD_CT1_NO;
SELECT PD_CT1_NO AS pdCt1No , NAME AS pdCt1Name , REG_DT AS regDt FROM TB_PD_CT_DEPTH1 WHERE USE_YN = 'Y' AND PD_CT1_NO = #{pdCt1No};
SELECT PD_CT1_NO AS pdCt1No , NAME AS pdCt1Name , REG_DT AS regDt FROM TB_PD_CT_DEPTH1 WHERE USE_YN = 'Y' AND NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{pdCt1SearchingNameKey},'%');
SELECT PD_CT2_NO AS pdCt2No , NAME AS pdCt2Name , USE_YN AS useYNEnum , REG_DT AS regDt FROM TB_PD_CT_DEPTH2 WHERE USE_YN = 'Y';

SELECT PD_CT2_NO AS pdCt2No , (SELECT NAME FROM tb_pd_ct_depth1 WHERE PD_CT1_NO = TB_PD_CT_DEPTH2.PD_CT1_NO) AS pdCt1Name , NAME AS pdCt2Name , USE_YN AS useYNEnum FROM TB_PD_CT_DEPTH2 WHERE USE_YN = 'Y';
